website_summaries.verdict: Very durable hitting tee that will give all ages of players the performance they need.
pros: All rubber construction will yield a good feedback when making contact with the ball
Extendable tube for players of different heights that stays in place well
Entire kit comes apart for transport
cons: Some parts might not fit together properly, leaving the tee wobbly

customer_reviews.title: FIXED POST SO IT DOES NOT COME OFF BASE WHEN HIT
customer_reviews.text: I FIXED MINE SO THE POST DOES NOT COME OFF WHEN HITTING. Like other reviews, the post kept coming off when my 9 yr old Grandson was batting. I placed a clamp around the bottom of base where the post fits into base. It does not come off now and does not seem to be doing any damage to TEE. For the price we LOVE This TEE.
customer_reviews.author: Kerri Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Easy and inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: Works well, but as a prior reviewer mentioned you must put a ring clamp around the base to keep it together. Easy and inexpensive, but should have been included by the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: EAnders

customer_reviews.title: Keeps Coming Apart
customer_reviews.text: I included a photo of the tee mid play session. Next hit and it will fall right off. It is incredibly frustrating. I don’t understand the good reviews. The materials themselves are very durable if you want a black rubber plate and a black rubber tube. Those are indestructible. Putting them together as a functional tee? Not so much. Disappointed. I will have my husband read through some of the reviews and see if he can fix it with a clamp, but that is extra work, time and expense. I would rather just have ordered one that works.
customer_reviews.author: A. Diacogiannis

customer_reviews.title: works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: works great for my kid. as per other purchaser's recommendation i put on a metal tie and it's good to go. my kid hits the ball and my dog brings it back. what else can i ask for. made with rubber its strong and flexible. Thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: never again shop retail

customer_reviews.title: RECEIVED EXACTLY AS ADVERTISED
customer_reviews.text: Tee works as advertised. The tee DOES come off the base when the batter hits the tee. Teaches and trains my 9 year old grandson to eye, focus, and hit ONLY the ball squarely off the tee. Grandson has to reattach or readjust the tee every time he either hits any part of the tee RATHER than ONLY THE BALL SQUARELY. It encourages and improves his bat to ball eye coordination. Helps prevent chopping or scooping the ball off the tee. Tee height adjustments works perfectly for his lower or upper strike zone swing adjustments. Great teaching and training tool. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: J. Arakawa

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect for tball training!
customer_reviews.text: This product is perfect for tee ball! We have 3 kids ranging in age from 3-6, two girls and one boy. The base plate is very durable and heavy enough to support the post from hard impacts. The post is rugged enough to sustain repeated blows from aluminum bats and releases from the base plate without injuring the players. We love it and it provides hours of beneficial fun.
customer_reviews.author: Salty Breezes

customer_reviews.title: Poor adjustment
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my daughter so she can practice in the backyard. We’ve had it less than a week and it will not stay up to the height she needs. We’ll probably keep it for my other daughter to practice t-ball.
customer_reviews.author: So¹³Cal

customer_reviews.title: Product ok. Tee Slips Out of Base Often
customer_reviews.text: Product function is ok. Product material is very heavy duty. Tee slips out of base fairly easy and requires constant adjustment. May try the clamp method to try and prevent tee from slipping out of base.
customer_reviews.author: bjonsn

customer_reviews.title: Play ball!
customer_reviews.text: Heavy material that seems like it will hold up to being smacked repeatedly. A little bit difficult to shove the stem I to the base, but once it is lodged in there, it seem to stay together. Bought this for my 4 yr old son; made a world of difference in him working in his proper stance and holding the bat.
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Using tee for the first time and already disappointed. It did NOT include a JUGS sticker on the base which always makes me question Amozon sellers. Also, like many other users, the bottom part of the tee is constantly coming out. My 16 y/o softball player can’t hit more than twice without the tee coming out of the base. Will be returning this item and cannot give good ratings on this item.
customer_reviews.author: GLamson

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty well made T
customer_reviews.text: Great T for my 14 year old middle school player very heavy duty adjust for height very easy !! There are some on her saying the shaft comes loose from the base haven't had that problem tg here is a lip on the bottom of the shaft that expands out into a grove on the bottom of the base a little hard to shove it through but once assembled no problem it's there to stay !! great product if I ever need another I would buy again !!
customer_reviews.author: Doug Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: I love how sturdy and heavy it is so it shouldn't ...
customer_reviews.text: I love how sturdy and heavy it is so it shouldn't topple over. The thing is...my kids can hit but, the center piece keeps falling off and is unstable when inserted into the base. No matte how I place it, it doesn't fit into the base very well.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina McKenzie

customer_reviews.title: Tee to the rescue.
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I made this purchase when our son was just in T-Ball and it was a big hit. Now that my son is in a FARM team it still comes in handy. Being the team mom and my husband being a assistant coach we always have a Little practicing on it. I'm glad that it's super easy to assemble and not heavy at all. Also it being rubber helps a lot too since we work with t-ball/FARM players.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Jeanmarie

customer_reviews.title: It’s not worth buying
customer_reviews.text: This didn’t last one day and the whole thing was cover in oil or grease. It kept coming off. Too much money for what it is. This is maybe $20 no more
customer_reviews.author: Jackoutofthebox

customer_reviews.title: Ready to use......
customer_reviews.text: A gift for my seven year old grand daughter. Perfect for her in size and ease of use, the steady, sturdy Home Plate style base is a great feature.....
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Can get the tee into the base
customer_reviews.text: I can't secure the tee in the base, so it keeps falling over. And there are no instructions to help with this!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No Issues
customer_reviews.text: First one had a tear at the top but amazon sent a replacement right away... been using the new one for months with no issues!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Don’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: The tee falls apart everytime my son hits a ball off of it
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: Great for practise!
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid rubber tee. The base is rubber, and the telescoping part is all rubber as well. The smaller vertical slides up and down inside the larger diameter lower one to alter the height. It looks identical to the one that is used in game and practice at my son's Tee-Ball. It holds balls just fine with a cup curved in to the top. It is strong enough to hold a pack of six (if you balance it right ;) ) - so weight is not an issue. Fantastic value and I recommend to friends!
customer_reviews.author: Martin Brown

customer_reviews.title: Good batting tee
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for a grandchild. She used it for a few weeks then out grew it for lack of a better term, it served it's purpose. this is a well built unit
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: We have had several others and we are so pleased with how sturdy this one was. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: LouVocals

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and heavy duty for the money. Only issue I’ve had is the top will detach from the base a couple times. This can be fixed by adding a hose clamp around the bottom. The bottom is very heavy duty with good weight so it doesn’t tip over all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and a perfect gift for any little leaguer to work on his hitting skills!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for all ages
customer_reviews.text: My kids love it and it seems to be durable enough for older kids (and adults who tell themselves they "still got it.").
customer_reviews.author: Michael Creekwood

customer_reviews.title: ... that the tee is made with seems to be pretty sturdy. It's holding up really well for our ...
customer_reviews.text: The rubber that the tee is made with seems to be pretty sturdy. It's holding up really well for our batting practice. I like how it breaks down. I can't seem to get the tee all the way into the base though, and it falls over after 20-30 swings.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Williams

customer_reviews.title: Works ok
customer_reviews.text: This works, but The vertical holding cylinder falls out of the base. Would be better to construct this so that part inserts from the bottom up, locking the two together.
customer_reviews.author: Prime time

customer_reviews.title: Looks the part, but needs a better mounting system
customer_reviews.text: Made of sturdy materials, this SHOULD be a really good unit. But the way the tee sits in the plate is not solid at all. Need something to tie it down.
customer_reviews.author: James M

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: Made it through a whole tball season so far with this tee. No obvious issues ive found at the time. Make sure you push top into bottom really well.
customer_reviews.author: jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It serves no purpose. Every ball you hit clean the tee falls off the plate. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Karina B.

customer_reviews.title: Ok but not great
customer_reviews.text: It is ok but not very sturdy. My 4 and 5 year old knock over the pole even after Dad has shoved it into the base.
customer_reviews.author: G.Gutierrez.

customer_reviews.title: Lazy design
customer_reviews.text: This tee is not worth buying. You have to push the tee into the base and it just falls out after a couple hits. It tips very easy too. I do not recommend this tee.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Smith

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the purchase
customer_reviews.text: The tee doesn’t stay in the base! When you go to hit, it comes apart.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne I Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Well made but....
customer_reviews.text: This is made of very thick rubber. The two pieces so not lock in together. Kind of frustrating watching 4 year olds knocking the tube out of the bottom piece
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Breaks on EVERY swing
customer_reviews.text: Should have read the reviews. The tee is not connected to the plate and disassembles after EVERY swing. Seems like a good value but not worth the hassle. Spend $20+ for a higher quality product for your little leaguer.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie S

customer_reviews.title: only thing missing is if the ball holder stem could ...
customer_reviews.text: only thing missing is if the ball holder stem could lock into the base so that you could move around w/o parting.
customer_reviews.author: DarceJay

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is legit. Heavy duty, more than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: M Dougherty

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Works well for my daughter who is starting fastpitch to work on hitting drills. It's pretty durable because she hits the tee more then the ball right now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overall good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very durable and easy to put together. The only thing I don’t like is how easy the tee separates from the plate but it’s a minor flaw for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Theisen

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Great product so far! I don't think the kids will be able to break this one. Nice and thick and heavy rubber. Easy to get together and adjust height but not to easy where you need to keep adjusting the height.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Durable product
customer_reviews.text: Just as advertised. Heavy base. Made of rubber. No problems.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila S. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: This tee stands up to older kids and younger kids. Don't waste money on anything lighter, it will just fall over.
customer_reviews.author: Darrlynn Ward

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was very sturdy and does not fall over when hit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: My son destroyed two other tees in less than a week. There is no way he can destroy this one anytime soon. Well made, nice and heavy.
customer_reviews.author: NGoodwin

customer_reviews.title: sort of heavy
customer_reviews.text: great tee for serious ball'rs like my son adjustable feature is great although top should be more flexible
customer_reviews.author: John and Christi Ledo

customer_reviews.title: Grandkids are getting a lot of use from it. ...
customer_reviews.text: Grandkids are getting a lot of use from it. Pole doesnt stay in the base though so that's a little disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndy Hetrick

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and well made. My kids love it. Would definitely recommend this tee ball stand.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Medina

customer_reviews.title: Working great for Tball kid
customer_reviews.text: Shopped around a lot and I think this is a great standard tee for most kids for the price point. Those expensive tees are nice though. I may have spent double if I were to do it again after trying other friends.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My grandson seems to like this, but the pole tends to slide down as you hit it.
customer_reviews.author: Tutu Debbie

customer_reviews.title: I am very disappointed and not sure how to get this corrected
customer_reviews.text: I am writing this review after receiving not just 1, but also the 2nd replacement, of these tees in which BOTH did not come with all the parts. Without the screw on the bottom (which I keep missing), the top half of the tee tends to fall over and is very unstable. I am very disappointed and not sure how to get this corrected. Looks like I will be going with brand of tees,....
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Not very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Not what I was hoping it would be. Since the stand pops into the base, it comes off VERY easily when batting. We have to replace back on the base most of the time because it falls off.
customer_reviews.author: Luseane

customer_reviews.title: Tee falls off base
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy material, but this tee Constantly falls off the base.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: No issues yet. Plan to use this for a few seasons.
customer_reviews.author: Otis P. Body

customer_reviews.title: Tee falls off
customer_reviews.text: Every time my son hits off this tee, the tee falls off. We cannot get it on right enough.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Good, solid tee.  Easy to put together and carry.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for batting practice for my daughter's 10u softball team. It's easy to carry, put up and take down. Uses a single bolt that keeps the tee connected to the base. The base is heavy and does not tip over. I would recommend this to anyone that needs a good tee that is portable.
customer_reviews.author: M. Sharp

customer_reviews.title: Great t
customer_reviews.text: Great t for my son but I don’t like that when he accidentally hits the t it bends or falls out.
customer_reviews.author: Summer Herringer

customer_reviews.title: Pro hitting tee
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my granddaughter and she loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Junk!! the tee always falls down even when you’re trying to use it you can’t because the tee falls before you can swing. I would give this a zero star if I could...
customer_reviews.author: james whitfill

customer_reviews.title: Legit equipment. Kids kept breaking the plastic tees. ...
customer_reviews.text: Legit equipment. Kids kept breaking the plastic tees. This thing can take a beating. Appropriate for children or adults.
customer_reviews.author: cj

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Tee
customer_reviews.text: This tee is solid for the price. The base is sturdy and the quality of the tube itself is impressive for the price. I used it with a softball size wiffleball and it was great. Even with some misses the tube seemed to hold up well. I recommend this tee for those looking for a solid inexpensive batting tee.
customer_reviews.author: LG19Gamer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for toddlers or older!
customer_reviews.text: Product is a little heavy, but once assembled (easily), my three and four yr olds love it! Rubber tee is strong enough to hold a ball up, but allows the kids to hit it without causing any damage. I can see them using this for years to come. Def recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: simple, well made tee
customer_reviews.text: This tee is made with very thick rubber & is holding up well. I don't tear it down to travel, but rather leave it assembled in the garage for practice in the yard. There is a bolt that goes into the bottom that you have to loosen to take the tee off & put on the plate for travel.
customer_reviews.author: INHUNTER

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Works well to give my lil guy an edge as to his swing in his strike zone.
customer_reviews.author: lou aguilar

customer_reviews.title: Tee comes out too easily and the base is too light
customer_reviews.text: Was expecting a more from a Jugs product. Tee comes out too easily and the base is too light, causing the tee to move after every at bat. The Franklin tee I bought was a lot more sturdier.
customer_reviews.author: OU Chot

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Tee, perfect for us
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 7yr old granddaughter and are very happy with the purchase. We were very surprised by the weight when it arrived, as it's fairly heavy. It seems very stable and durable. It's already taken a bit of abuse from an inexperienced batter, but is holding up very well so far.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and my son loves it. He hits into a net in the garage and this thing is durable.
customer_reviews.author: jq

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The Dam tee keeps falling off after ever hit!!!! not worth it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: efrain cordero

customer_reviews.title: Excellent T-ball hitting tee
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old son's T-ball team made good use of this hitting tee. The one that came with the team's equipment was crooked. We used this one for the games. Will use it in the future to practice swings on low/high inside pitches. Very solid and easy to transport in my SUV.
customer_reviews.author: jdrite

customer_reviews.title: Turns kids into babe ruth
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old is now hitting 400 foot home runs thanks to this tee!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Great Tee!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 2 year old to start learning how to play tee ball and I can tell it will definitely last through the years. It adjusts short enough for him to be able to hit off of, and tall enough for an adult! We love it.
customer_reviews.author: heathershelton

customer_reviews.title: Kids and their Dad love it.
customer_reviews.text: After playing baseball my whole life, I was looking to see if my kids were interested. They are young so I bought them this tee to play with. They go out and play with it from time to time in the back yard. I am glad to see that they haven't lost interest am am going to go ahead and sign them up for tee ball. Product is good, heavy duty quality. Price is good. Not that we do it much, but I also like that you can unscrew it on the bottom and throw it in the trunk. Would be a huge bonus for a coach with a small car (which maybe be me soon)!
customer_reviews.author: C Powers

customer_reviews.title: Decent Tee for kids
customer_reviews.text: This tee has worked out fine for a 9U tournament team. I wish it would go a little shorter as in can't be set up below about belly button height for the boys. That said it hasn't been broken yet, which is more than I can say for the cheap plastic ones I have bought at a local sporting goods store.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great! 10ur old hits 100’s a day and it’s still a OK!
customer_reviews.author: Climbing Doogie

customer_reviews.title: my son loves it
customer_reviews.text: We got this for my son to help him play t-ball he is 5 and tall for his age but we were ablr to use it just fine ..even when my nephew came over he is 4 and short for his age so it works well for various heights.
customer_reviews.author: sabrina west

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: The ball stand falls off after a few hits in a row but other than that it’s great for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Solid Tee, well worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I wonder if the reviewer who's kid broke this after 3 swings was Barry Bonds dad? This thing is SOLID - I expect to have this for my grand kids it is so heavy duty. It is easy to setup and my 2 & 4 year olds love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey J. Callahan

customer_reviews.title: tlb
customer_reviews.text: Product has a trouble with base stem comes out after heavy use with a team. contacted jugs they said to move the bottom peice up into the stem but even after that the product still gave us headaches.
customer_reviews.author: terrie l. Blasengame

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I got this Tee to introduce hitting to my almost-3 year-old. In it's lowest position it is the perfect height for him. It adjusts higher so it will grow with him. It is sturdy and doesn't tip over. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: BronxD

customer_reviews.title: Made of THICK rubber
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent heavy rubber tee. I can't imagine it not lasting years. It telescopes down to fit my 5 y/o son with about the right amount of friction. It's easy to break down if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Hurry up your kid needs it!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Easy to use and my kid hits well off of it! Solid and sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro Salinas

customer_reviews.title: video tutorial doesn't work, goes to GoDaddy
customer_reviews.text: QR code goes to a GoDaddy page, but tee seems very functional
customer_reviews.author: DT

customer_reviews.title: Perfect tee for my son, very well built.
customer_reviews.text: Hours so far have been spent hitting off of this, and works flawless unlike other we have only used. This is our first time owning a tee and it performs well.
customer_reviews.author: Icyharp

customer_reviews.title: Great pice and love the size
customer_reviews.text: This was a great choice it is very compact and very durable. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Miriam Maltz

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was fast. Price was good. Its a tee and it works. Not too complicated; it does its job. Its strong enough to take a beating and isn't flimsy. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Good tee
customer_reviews.text: Jus t a regular good tee for working on hitting with my 12 year old son.Seems to be sturdy so far.i will do a follow up if it breaks.
customer_reviews.author: dmac

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great item sturdy, and so easy to put together and store away
customer_reviews.author: Mario Mazariegos

customer_reviews.title: Did not come with tee upright.
customer_reviews.text: Did not come with the tee upright, only the base.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Bosworth

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Our son is practicing and using the "heck" out of this! Works great! Was delivered quickly! Will definitely hold up to the use it will face!
customer_reviews.author: S deSoto

customer_reviews.title: Bet T made
customer_reviews.text: I have coached for years and Jugs make the best Tee's in my opinion. They are very rugged and stand up to the pounding they take.
customer_reviews.author: Louisiana Liquidator

customer_reviews.title: JUGS Tee
customer_reviews.text: I do like the Jugs tee and have had many, but after use the tube that you place the ball on breaks/cracks so I have lowered my rating.
customer_reviews.author: TeamGUTS

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality tee and can stand up to the rigors of youngsters who hit the tee more than they hit the ball. Good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Fresburg

customer_reviews.title: well made, BEEFY
customer_reviews.text: Nothing cheap here. Meets expectations and well built. This thing will last for 10+ years. Quick disassembly with one (big fat) screw makes it easy to store.
customer_reviews.author: J. Costarella

customer_reviews.title: Not as sturdy as I hoped
customer_reviews.text: Not as sturdy as I hoped. If you're using on younger kids and they tend to hit the tee instead of the ball it falls out continually. Its soft rubber so harder rubber or plastic might have been a better choice for us.
customer_reviews.author: Tuckje

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money. heavy duty great tee
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty holds up great to 3 kids using it
customer_reviews.author: Jerred Shultz

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son after he broke the previous one from a different manufacturer after a few swings. The quality of the Jugs tee is superb.
customer_reviews.author: BK

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Does smell like other reviews say, but overall a good tee.
customer_reviews.author: Louis

customer_reviews.title: years of fun
customer_reviews.text: I bought this several years ago for my grandson and it has held up well. Great for training with just us or the whole team.
customer_reviews.author: mviexprt

customer_reviews.title: Great tee!
customer_reviews.text: This tee has worked great. It has been sitting outside since we bought it and is still in great condition.
customer_reviews.author: K. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Parts missing
customer_reviews.text: I have bought these before, and they carry a cap on the bottom to screw the stand together. It did not come with it and there was no paperwork for me to contact anybody. Pretty pissed off.
customer_reviews.author: fredy

customer_reviews.title: Very rugged and durable.
customer_reviews.text: My boys love hitting from this tee. The younger one hits the tee more than the ball, but that's part of the learning process.
customer_reviews.author: Joe G

customer_reviews.title: Missing hardware and instructions
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my son while I was overseas. Thought it would be easy enough for my wife to assemble on her own. It arrived on time just missing the hardware and instructions. So it will be just collecting dust until I have someone size it for a bolt for my wife and son.
customer_reviews.author: jeremey orchitt

product_meta.title: JUGS Hit Like a Pro Hitting Tee
product_meta.description:
Durable JUGS Hitting Tee is perfect for batting practice and T-Ball games.

AMAZON.COM




The tee is an ideal size to introduce children to the game, and a telescoping design will grow with the player. This simple, durable hitting tee is ideal for young players' batting practice and tee ball games. A heavyweight solid rubber base provides a stable platform to hit from, while a fully adjustable telescoping extension tube allows for use by players of different sizes. Disassembles for easy storage when not in use. About JUGS
JUGS makes the bestselling pitching machine in the world, and is also the leading producer of popular baseball training aids like batting cages, protective nets, balls, and more.
feature_bullets: The most durable hitting tee on the market in the under $75 category.
2D Barcode located on base of tee links to video, highlighting the proper way to use the tee for both right- and left-handed hitters, softball and baseball drills and educational tips.
NEW ribbed upper tee tube prevents your tee tube from slipping during practice.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
